verse: I'm my beloved's and He is mine
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
He brought me to His banqueting table
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
He lifts me up into heavenly places
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
Jesus is the Rock of my salvation
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
His banner over me is love.
